title: Blog-Based Reflective and Interactive Learning Design for Large-Scale Nutrition Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: In large-scale nutrition lectures, introduces small-group online activities and reflective blog groups to promote conceptual change and learning. Instructors analyze blog discussions to identify misconceptions and inform targeted guidance

learning_goals: Learners can identify misconceptions about key nutritional concepts and correct them based on scientific evidence
Learners can provide peer feedback and engage in constructive discussions through blog-based interactions
Learners can enhance self-reflection skills and apply learning content to real-world cases through 4 weeks of blog activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
